citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item 2.31 c 3
At the time of inspection it was noticed that the IACUC performed an inspection in June of their farm location, the IACUC
failed to classify the deficiencies as minor or significant , nor did the IACUC have a majority of its member sign the
report.
The IACUC needs to insure semiannual report is complete and insure the report is signed by a majority of IACUC
members.
Correct from this day 8/4/2021

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item 2.31 (d ) 1 iii
At the time of inspection the protocols 19-09 and 19-08 were reviewed. The principal investigator failed to provide to the
IACUC written assurance that the activities do not unnecessarily duplicate previous experiments.
The IACUC shall insure the principal investigator provides written assurance the activities do unnecessarily duplicate
previous experiments.
Correct from this day 8/4/2021

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Item 2.31 e 2
At the time of inspection the protocols 19-08 and 19-09 were reviewed, the investigator failed to provide the rationale for
appropriateness of the species to the IACUC.
The IACUC shall insure that all protocols involving the use of animals have a rationale for the species being used.
Correct from this day 8/4/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section
